global-fap.description: Edition of 100. Designed by Current Art Studios in Amsterdam. Surrealist at times but always palpable is the universe behind our series of digital collages. Like a still frame from a french Nouvelle Vague film or a Dali embossed dream sequence, our collages take you to another dimension within the comfort of your own homes. Printed on museum quality fine art paper.

Edition of 100. Designed by Current Art Studios in Amsterdam. Surrealist at times but always palpable is the universe behind our series of digital collages. Like a still frame from a french Nouvelle Vague film or a Dali embossed dream sequence, our collages take you to another dimension within the comfort of your own homes. Printed on museum quality fine art paper.

Edition of 100. Designed by Current Art Studios in Amsterdam. Surrealist at times but always palpable is the universe behind our series of digital collages. Like a still frame from a french Nouvelle Vague film or a Dali embossed dream sequence, our collages take you to another dimension within the comfort of your own homes. Printed on museum quality fine art paper.

Edition of 100. Designed by Current Art Studios in Amsterdam. An air of the familiar, yet the excitement of the unknown is definitive of our illustrations. Nostalgic of a moment or an experience you’ve never had, a person you never knew or a song you never heard. The aim is for artworks to take you somewhere for the first time, again. Printed on museum quality fine art paper.
